variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: INSERM_B
variable.comment: One control sample was run per batch of FHS samples

variable.name: INSERM_ID
variable.comment: Based on box number and position number for example: "Fram-7-99" refers to box 7, position 99.

variable.name: plt_cont
variable.description: Platelet contamination (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_mean
variable.description: Microparticle mean count (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd11
variable.description: Total number of CD11a+ leukocyte microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd235
variable.description: Total number of CD235a+ erythrocyte microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd144
variable.description: Total number of CD144+ endothelial microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd62e
variable.description: Total number of CD62e+ endothelial microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_annv
variable.description: Total number Annexin V+ microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd41
variable.description: Total number of CD31+CD41+ platelet microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)

variable.name: mp_cd31
variable.description: Total number of CD31+CD41- endothelial microparticles in events (sample: platelet poor plasma - citrate)
